definitions.definition: a bad person who harms other people or breaks the law:
examples: Some people believe that Richard III was not the villain he is generally thought to have been.

definitions.definition: a character in a book, play, film, etc. who harms other people:
examples: He made his reputation as an actor playing villains.

definitions.definition: something or someone considered harmful or dangerous:
examples: We've always been told that cholesterol was a major cause of heart disease but, actually, saturated fat is the worst villain.
